item.title: How to backup and restore Ghost
item.description: In this article I will describe how to create a backup of the Ghost database and directory, back it up and restore it. Prerequisites: Ghost running on a VPS Google Drive, or similar Creating the Backup Step 1 - Backup the database In this step we will create a copy of the database and the directory.
